scenes.title: The Soggy Briefing
narration: You and a few other recruits stand ankle-deep in dungeon runoff while Keith, your allegedly omniscient narrator, waits for you to pick a direction.
A trio of options presents itself: a corridor humming with arcane energy, a suspicious lever, and a door labeled 'Definitely Not A Mimic'.

choices.label: Open the door marked 'Definitely Not A Mimic'

scenes.title: Levers and Ledgerdemain
narration: The lever is attached to a wall of gears that squeal in protest. A hidden compartment opens, revealing a maintenance crawlway and a warning etched in goblin shorthand.
Keith snickers, betting five gold you pull something you shouldn't.

choices.label: Reverse the lever to see what happens

scenes.title: Arcane Laboratory
narration: Crackling runes ignite along the floor. A spectral lecturer begins a monotone welcome about workplace safety in hazardous magical environments.
You spy a console with glowing runes and a glass case filled with swirling potions.

scenes.title: Definitely A Mimic
narration: The door, of course, was a mimic. Fortunately it’s unionised and only lightly nibbles your gauntlet as a greeting.
Keith applauds your commitment to chaos and points out a hallway decorated with teeth marks.

choices.label: Retreat and reconsider your life choices

scenes.title: Goblin Crawlspace
narration: The crawlway smells like stale rations and ambition. You discover schematics of the dungeon along with goblin doodles mocking upper management.
One sketch highlights a secret elevator that bypasses two levels.

choices.label: Crawl back to the main chamber

scenes.title: Potion Roulette
narration: You uncork the shimmering vial. It smells like citrus and imminent consequences.
Keith watches with popcorn as the liquid fizzes and invites you to pick a follow-up action.

choices.label: Chug the potion like a dare

scenes.title: Unionized Mimic Buddy
narration: The mimic decides your gauntlet tastes like loyalty and agrees to follow you—at least until the next break.
Keith awards you a dubious ally and a pamphlet on mimic labor rights.

choices.label: Send the mimic ahead as a scout
Return to the main chamber with your new pal

scenes.title: Secret Elevator
narration: The elevator hums to life, lowering you toward a deeper level as enchanted elevator music kicks in.
A control panel asks whether you want to continue downward or regroup.

choices.label: Ride back to the main hall

scenes.title: Rune Console Triumph
narration: Your fingers dance over the glyphs with academic flourish. The console emits a satisfied chime and rewards you with a diagnostic map of the wing.
Keith jots down your name under 'wizardly overachievers'.

scenes.title: Arcane Misfire
narration: The console pulses angrily, blasting you with a harmless yet humiliating spray of glitter. Keith narrates the mishap with award-winning sarcasm.
A maintenance sprite appears, muttering that you should probably head back to orientation.
